item.title: FabCon Vienna: Build data-rich agents on an enterprise-ready foundation
item.description: Learn about the new features and enhancements announced for Microsoft Fabric at FabCon Vienna 2025 The post FabCon Vienna: Build data-rich agents on an enterprise-ready foundation appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-fabric/blog/2025/09/16/fabcon-vienna-build-data-rich-agents-on-an-enterprise-ready-foundation
